alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 5:23PM EDT until March 25 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cook County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coolidge, or 13 miles northeast of Thomasville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Hahira, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil, Barney, Autreyville, Greggs, Enon, Patten, Merrillville, I-75 At Exit 29, Hollis, I-75 At Exit 22 and Murphy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
